Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2009 06:44PM Cheri2 wrote: Hi Sweet Pea!   I have been keeping up with your story but just want to tell you, I think you are an amazing little girl!!!  Everyone on this website has gone through what you are going through but we are a lot older and this is hard on all of us but we are all very concerned about you because you are so sweet and young!!!  I am so very sorry you are having to go through this!  You are in all of our hearts!!!! Keep smiling!  Mama Elephant Cheri
Posts.Title: HELP! 10 year old with bc cjsocal Mary-Lou

Posts.Content: Jun 27, 2009 10:23PM Cheri2 wrote: I got a hematoma too!  Not fun!!!  I ended up needing pain pills!  My bilateral mastectomy was 6 weeks after by biopsy and it was still bruised then!!!!  Sure enough after the mastectomy (with all the tissue gone) I woke up to the bruises being gone!  Ask your doctor for pain pills if you need them to sleep!  Don't take any aspirin based products and drink protein drinks and eat a lot of protein for healing!
Posts.Title: Brilliantly colored hematoma shouting out for attention MaryNY jpann39
